name: SPINE ROUTER 01
desc: High Performance L3 Core Router, Node 1. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eth_to_leaf3' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.1.1/30), 'eth_to_leaf4' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.2.1/30), 'eth_to_leaf5' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.3.1/30), and 'eth_to_edge9' (IP 10.200.1.2/30, gateway 10.200.1.1). Also defines 'routes': to 172.16.20.0/24 via 10.0.1.2 (metric 100), to 172.16.20.0/24 via 10.0.2.2 (metric 100), and to 172.16.30.0/24 via 10.0.3.2 (metric 100).)**

name: ETH_TO_LEAF3
desc: Physical interface on Spine Router 01. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.1.1/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.1.1/30 assigned to interface eth_to_leaf3 on Spine Router 01.)**

name: ETH_TO_LEAF4
desc: Physical interface on Spine Router 01. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.2.1/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.2.1/30 assigned to interface eth_to_leaf4 on Spine Router 01.)**

name: ETH_TO_LEAF5
desc: Physical interface on Spine Router 01. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.3.1/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.3.1/30 assigned to interface eth_to_leaf5 on Spine Router 01.)**

name: ETH_TO_EDGE9
desc: Physical interface on Spine Router 01. Assigned IP address 10.200.1.2/30 and uses 10.200.1.1 as gateway4.)**
IP Subnet 10.200.1.2/30 assigned to interface eth_to_edge9 on Spine Router 01.)**
Gateway IP address 10.200.1.1 for interface eth_to_edge9 on Spine Router 01, and next-hop for default route on Compute Leaf 01.)**
Destination network subnet 172.16.20.0/24 for static routes on Spine Router 01 and VLAN interface bond0.30 on High-Performance Storage Server.)**
Next-hop IP address 10.0.1.2 for route to 172.16.20.0/24 on Spine Router 01.)**
Next-hop IP address 10.0.2.2 for route to 172.16.20.0/24 on Spine Router 01.)**
Destination network subnet 172.16.30.0/24 for static route on Spine Router 01.)**
Next-hop IP address 10.0.3.2 for route to 172.16.30.0/24 on Spine Router 01.)**

name: SPINE ROUTER 02
desc: Redundant L3 Core Router, Node 2. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eth_to_leaf3' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.11.1/30), 'eth_to_leaf6' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.13.1/30), and 'eth_to_edge10' (IP 10.200.2.2/30, gateway 10.200.2.1).)**

name: ETH_TO_LEAF3
desc: Physical interface on Spine Router 02. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.11.1/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.11.1/30 assigned to interface eth_to_leaf3 on Spine Router 02.)**

name: ETH_TO_LEAF6
desc: Physical interface on Spine Router 02. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.13.1/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.13.1/30 assigned to interface eth_to_leaf6 on Spine Router 02.)**

name: ETH_TO_EDGE10
desc: Physical interface on Spine Router 02. Assigned IP address 10.200.2.2/30 and uses 10.200.2.1 as gateway4.)**
IP Subnet 10.200.2.2/30 assigned to interface eth_to_edge10 on Spine Router 02.)**
Gateway IP address 10.200.2.1 for interface eth_to_edge10 on Spine Router 02.)**

name: COMPUTE LEAF 01
desc: Top-of-Rack Switch for Compute Cluster, Node 3. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eth_uplink_spine1' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.1.2/30), 'eth_uplink_spine2' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.11.2/30), and 'eth_downlink_srv8' (DHCP disabled). Defines 'bonds' with 'bond_tor_compute' (mode 802.3ad LACP, fast LACP rate, MII monitor interval 100ms, member 'eth_downlink_srv8'). Defines 'vlans' with 'vlan10_mgmt' (ID 10, linked to 'bond_tor_compute', IP 192.168.1.253/24) and 'vlan20_vm' (ID 20, linked to 'bond_tor_compute', IP 172.16.20.253/24). Also defines 'routes': default route (0.0.0.0/0) via 10.0.1.1 (metric 100) and default route (0.0.0.0/0) via 10.0.11.1 (metric 100).)**

name: ETH_UPLINK_SPINE1
desc: Physical uplink interface on Compute Leaf 01. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.1.2/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.1.2/30 assigned to interface eth_uplink_spine1 on Compute Leaf 01.)**

name: ETH_UPLINK_SPINE2
desc: Physical uplink interface on Compute Leaf 01. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.11.2/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.11.2/30 assigned to interface eth_uplink_spine2 on Compute Leaf 01.)**

name: ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV8
desc: Physical downlink interface on Compute Leaf 01. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond_tor_compute.)**

name: BOND_TOR_COMPUTE
desc: LACP Bond Interface on Compute Leaf 01. Parameters: mode 802.3ad (LACP), lacp-rate fast, mii-monitor-interval 100. Aggregates physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv8'.)**

name: VLAN10_MGMT
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 10 on Compute Leaf 01. Linked to parent 'bond_tor_compute'. Assigned IP 192.168.1.253/24.)**
IP Subnet 192.168.1.253/24 assigned to VLAN interface vlan10_mgmt on Compute Leaf 01.)**

name: VLAN20_VM
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 20 on Compute Leaf 01. Linked to parent 'bond_tor_compute'. Assigned IP 172.16.20.253/24.)**
IP Subnet 172.16.20.253/24 assigned to VLAN interface vlan20_vm on Compute Leaf 01.)**
Default route destination network 0.0.0.0/0 for Compute Leaf 01.)**
Next-hop IP address 10.0.1.1 for default route on Compute Leaf 01.)**
Next-hop IP address 10.0.11.1 for default route on Compute Leaf 01.)**

name: COMPUTE LEAF 02
desc: Redundant Top-of-Rack Switch for Compute Cluster, Node 4. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eth_uplink_spine1' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.2.2/30) and 'eth_downlink_srv8' (DHCP disabled). Defines 'bonds' with 'bond_tor_compute' (mode 802.3ad, member 'eth_downlink_srv8'). Defines 'vlans' with 'vlan20_vm' (ID 20, linked to 'bond_tor_compute', IP 172.16.20.254/24).)**

name: ETH_UPLINK_SPINE1
desc: Physical uplink interface on Compute Leaf 02. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.2.2/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.2.2/30 assigned to interface eth_uplink_spine1 on Compute Leaf 02.)**

name: ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV8
desc: Physical downlink interface on Compute Leaf 02. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond_tor_compute.)**

name: BOND_TOR_COMPUTE
desc: LACP Bond Interface on Compute Leaf 02. Parameters: mode 802.3ad. Aggregates physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv8'.)**

name: VLAN20_VM
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 20 on Compute Leaf 02. Linked to parent 'bond_tor_compute'. Assigned IP 172.16.20.254/24.)**
IP Subnet 172.16.20.254/24 assigned to VLAN interface vlan20_vm on Compute Leaf 02.)**

name: STORAGE LEAF 01
desc: Top-of-Rack Switch for Storage Cluster, Node 5. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eth_uplink_spine1' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.3.2/30) and 'eth_downlink_srv7' (MTU 9000, DHCP disabled). Defines 'bonds' with 'bond_tor_storage' (MTU 9000, mode 802.3ad, member 'eth_downlink_srv7'). Defines 'vlans' with 'vlan30_san' (ID 30, linked to 'bond_tor_storage', MTU 9000, IP 172.16.30.253/24).)**

name: ETH_UPLINK_SPINE1
desc: Physical uplink interface on Storage Leaf 01. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.3.2/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.3.2/30 assigned to interface eth_uplink_spine1 on Storage Leaf 01.)**

name: ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV7
desc: Physical downlink interface on Storage Leaf 01. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond_tor_storage.)**

name: BOND_TOR_STORAGE
desc: LACP Bond Interface on Storage Leaf 01. Configured with MTU 9000. Parameters: mode 802.3ad. Aggregates physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv7'.)**

name: VLAN30_SAN
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 30 on Storage Leaf 01. Linked to parent 'bond_tor_storage'. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP 172.16.30.253/24.)**
IP Subnet 172.16.30.253/24 assigned to VLAN interface vlan30_san on Storage Leaf 01.)**

name: STORAGE LEAF 02
desc: Redundant Top-of-Rack Switch for Storage Cluster, Node 6. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eth_uplink_spine2' (MTU 9000, IP 10.0.13.2/30) and 'eth_downlink_srv7' (MTU 9000, DHCP disabled). Defines 'bonds' with 'bond_tor_storage' (MTU 9000, mode 802.3ad, member 'eth_downlink_srv7'). Defines 'vlans' with 'vlan30_san' (ID 30, linked to 'bond_tor_storage', MTU 9000, IP 172.16.30.254/24).)**

name: ETH_UPLINK_SPINE2
desc: Physical uplink interface on Storage Leaf 02. Configured with MTU 9000 and assigned IP address 10.0.13.2/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.0.13.2/30 assigned to interface eth_uplink_spine2 on Storage Leaf 02.)**

name: ETH_DOWNLINK_SRV7
desc: Physical downlink interface on Storage Leaf 02. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond_tor_storage.)**

name: BOND_TOR_STORAGE
desc: LACP Bond Interface on Storage Leaf 02. Configured with MTU 9000. Parameters: mode 802.3ad. Aggregates physical interface 'eth_downlink_srv7'.)**

name: VLAN30_SAN
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 30 on Storage Leaf 02. Linked to parent 'bond_tor_storage'. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP 172.16.30.254/24.)**
IP Subnet 172.16.30.254/24 assigned to VLAN interface vlan30_san on Storage Leaf 02.)**

name: HIGH-PERFORMANCE STORAGE SERVER
desc: High-Performance Storage Server, Node 7. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eno1' (MTU 9000, DHCP disabled) and 'eno2' (MTU 9000, DHCP disabled). Defines 'bonds' with 'bond0_storage' (MTU 9000, mode 802.3ad LACP, transmit-hash-policy layer3+4, members 'eno1', 'eno2'). Defines 'vlans' with 'bond0.30' (ID 30, linked to 'bond0_storage', MTU 9000, IP 172.16.30.10/24, with a route to 172.16.30.0/24 via 172.16.30.253).)**

name: ENO1
desc: Physical interface on High-Performance Storage Server. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond0_storage.)**

name: ENO2
desc: Physical interface on High-Performance Storage Server. Configured with MTU 9000. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond0_storage.)**

name: BOND0_STORAGE
desc: LACP Bond Interface on High-Performance Storage Server. Configured with MTU 9000. Parameters: mode 802.3ad (LACP active-active), transmit-hash-policy layer3+4. Aggregates physical interfaces 'eno1' and 'eno2'.)**

name: BOND0.30
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 30 on High-Performance Storage Server. Linked to parent 'bond0_storage'. Configured with MTU 9000. Assigned IP 172.16.30.10/24. Includes a route to 172.16.30.0/24 via 172.16.30.253.)**
IP Subnet 172.16.30.10/24 assigned to VLAN interface bond0.30 on High-Performance Storage Server.)**
Next-hop IP address 172.16.30.253 for route to 172.16.30.0/24 on VLAN interface bond0.30 on High-Performance Storage Server.)**

name: COMPUTE HYPERVISOR
desc: Compute Hypervisor, Node 8. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'eth0' (DHCP disabled) and 'eth1' (DHCP disabled). Defines 'bonds' with 'bond0_compute' (mode 802.3ad, members 'eth0', 'eth1'). Defines 'vlans' with 'bond0.10' (ID 10, linked to 'bond0_compute', IP 192.168.1.100/24, gateway 192.168.1.253) and 'bond0.20' (ID 20, linked to 'bond0_compute'). Defines 'bridges' with 'br_vm_data' (member 'bond0.20', STP disabled, forward-delay 0).)**

name: ETH0
desc: Physical interface on Compute Hypervisor. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond0_compute.)**

name: ETH1
desc: Physical interface on Compute Hypervisor. DHCPv4 is disabled. Member of bond0_compute.)**

name: BOND0_COMPUTE
desc: LACP Bond Interface on Compute Hypervisor. Parameters: mode 802.3ad. Aggregates physical interfaces 'eth0' and 'eth1'.)**

name: BOND0.10
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 10 on Compute Hypervisor. Linked to parent 'bond0_compute'. Assigned IP 192.168.1.100/24 and uses 192.168.1.253 as gateway4.)**
IP Subnet 192.168.1.100/24 assigned to VLAN interface bond0.10 on Compute Hypervisor.)**
Gateway IP address 192.168.1.253 for VLAN interface bond0.10 on Compute Hypervisor.)**

name: BOND0.20
desc: VLAN Interface with ID 20 on Compute Hypervisor. Linked to parent 'bond0_compute'. Member of bridge br_vm_data.)**

name: BR_VM_DATA
desc: Bridge interface on Compute Hypervisor. Parameters: STP disabled, forward-delay 0. Bridges member interface 'bond0.20'.)**

name: EDGE ROUTER 01
desc: Primary WAN Gateway, Node 9. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'wan0_internet' (IP 203.0.113.10/24, gateway 203.0.113.1) and 'lan0_to_spine1' (IP 10.200.1.1/30). Also defines 'routes': to 172.16.0.0/16 via 10.200.1.2.)**

name: WAN0_INTERNET
desc: Physical WAN interface on Edge Router 01. Assigned IP address 203.0.113.10/24 and uses 203.0.113.1 as gateway4.)**
IP Subnet 203.0.113.10/24 assigned to interface wan0_internet on Edge Router 01.)**
Gateway IP address 203.0.113.1 for interface wan0_internet on Edge Router 01 and Edge Router 02.)**

name: LAN0_TO_SPINE1
desc: Physical LAN interface on Edge Router 01. Assigned IP address 10.200.1.1/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.200.1.1/30 assigned to interface lan0_to_spine1 on Edge Router 01.)**
Destination network subnet 172.16.0.0/16 for static routes on Edge Router 01 and Edge Router 02.)**
Next-hop IP address 10.200.1.2 for route to 172.16.0.0/16 on Edge Router 01.)**

name: EDGE ROUTER 02
desc: Secondary WAN Gateway, Node 10. Configuration includes: 'ethernets' with 'wan0_internet' (IP 203.0.113.11/24, gateway 203.0.113.1) and 'lan0_to_spine2' (IP 10.200.2.1/30). Also defines 'routes': to 172.16.0.0/16 via 10.200.2.2.)**

name: WAN0_INTERNET
desc: Physical WAN interface on Edge Router 02. Assigned IP address 203.0.113.11/24 and uses 203.0.113.1 as gateway4.)**
IP Subnet 203.0.113.11/24 assigned to interface wan0_internet on Edge Router 02.)**

name: LAN0_TO_SPINE2
desc: Physical LAN interface on Edge Router 02. Assigned IP address 10.200.2.1/30.)**
IP Subnet 10.200.2.1/30 assigned to interface lan0_to_spine2 on Edge Router 02.)**
Next-hop IP address 10.200.2.2 for route to 172.16.0.0/16 on Edge Router 02.)**
